name: Elective Assignment1
body:
Your homework for the first class is to find one piece of your previous code and clear it up according to the requirement.

###Upload the **c#** script you made change on to:  

**//Randon/nhsga/Students/yourandrewid/**  

###Due Date  
Tue Jul 19th, 23:59 pm

**We only accept C# script!**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
